name: CubWars
description:
A small game I made in roughly 7  hours for the #ue4jam

Play with up to 4 friend in split screen against each other, the first to get to 100 points wins.

Kill your opponents or collect coins to get points. Killing and opponent will make them drop 1/4 of their coins

Player 1 uses keyboard and mouse WASD to move, space to jump, left mouse button to fire

The other players will need controllers, left analog stick to move, A to jump, RB to fire
